title: The Scum Villain’s Self-Saving System: BingJiu - Novel Updates
author: 祸魁
description:
Chasing wife to the crematorium*

*This refers to a novel or storyline wherein the gong first abuses his wife and then when the wife has completely given up, the gong will then realize what he lost and start chasing his wife frantically, without any regard to dignity, by any means, and begging for forgiveness and love from his former lover (新手上路, 2020).>
